p: Aside from the aforementioned approaches, Genexine Inc. is exploring a new vaccine via utilizing the Hyleukin-7 platform technology [162]. Such a platform may improve the immune responses fusing IL-7 with hyFc, aiming to hybridize IgD and IgG4 for the long-term effect of Fc fusion proteins [163], [164], [165]. Specifically, IgD possesses a flexible hinge structure and can maximize the biological activity [153, 154]. IgG4 possesses an unexposed junction site that mitigates immunogenicity via preventing antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity [155, 156]. This corporation reported enhanced vaccine efficacy, lung T cell accumulation, and plasmacytoid dendritic cell growth after Fc-fused IL-7 treatment in the virus infection models [166].
